Package net.minestom.server.scoreboard

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.scoreboard.Team
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Audience, ForwardingAudience, PacketGroupingAudience
    public class Team
extends Object
implements PacketGroupingAudience
    This object represents a team on a scoreboard that has a common display theme and other properties.
